title: Creating an Account
body:
Hi all,

I am trying to create an account for my son, when going through the sign up page, everything will verify with the green tick except for the date of birth, no matter what details i put into this field it will not verify and always shows as "sign up failed" when you attempt to create account. 

Please help.

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you enter a DOB that is too young to play the game and then continue to try to register an account you will not be permitted to, this can be remedied by clearing your browser's cookies.

Can I ask how old your child is? If he is under 13 then he does not meet the minimum age to register for an account on the game.

See the quote from the [Terms of Use](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse) below;

>THE SITE AND THE GAME ARE NOT DIRECTED AT CHILDREN UNDER 13 YEARS OF AGE, NOR DOES RIOT GAMES KNOWINGLY COLLECT INFORMATION FROM CHILDREN UNDER 13. IF YOU ARE UNDER 13, PLEASE DO NOT SUBMIT ANY PERSONALLY IDENTIFIABLE INFORMATION TO RIOT GAMES.
Thank you, clearing cookies fixed the issue.
